name: Rhythm Doctor Custom Level
summary: An RDZIP file is a custom level created for use in Rhythm Doctor, a one-button rhythm game. It is a Zip archive that contains all the level's assets, including one or more .OGG audio files, .JPG and/or .PNG images, and a main.rdlevel file. Players create RDZIP files using Rhythm Doctor's Level Editor.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename .rdzip to .zip ; decompress with any Zip-decompression utility.
